name: CastleAbra - Funny, Gothic Indie Game!
blurb: A dark comedy set in the confines of an inexplicable castle. Save the Princess from falling prey to the Wizard's sinister plans!

rewards.reward: All contributors will receive a digital comic written and drawn by the artist. If you enjoyed the intro, you will like the comic. It has not been fully written yet, but will most likely focus on the wizard meeting the Princess and falling into dark, obsessive love. Awww.\r\n\r\nThe comic will be exclusively yours for at least a couple months before we post it on our site. We hope to get the comic to you before the game comes out.
A digital copy of CastleAbra! Mac or PC, your choice. This game will retail for at least $10 dollars. So you're getting quite the deal! Plus the comic.

An exclusive early demo of the game, this will only be available to Kickstarter supporters.

You also get a digital copy of the finished game! Your choice Mac or PC. 

Plus the digital comic.

Cool swag! First, a high quality silk-screened t-shirt featuring one of the CastleAbra characters (most likely the octopus). This shirt will be a Kickstarter exclusive so it will forever brand you as a Facepuncher Kickstarter!  How cool is that?

International orders, add $10 for shipping.

We will also offer a digital copy of the soundtrack featuring Rodney's incredible score as well as a cute little pop song you'll hear a part of in the game.

Plus everything above.

A unique, hand drawn (pencil on paper) illustration of any character or monster in CastleAbra. You choose. These will be done after the game's completion. It may take a while for your drawing to arrive depending on how successful our funding is. First come first serve. Plus everything above.

I will draw anything you want in Photoshop!

Just 3 rules. I have to be able to complete it in 10 hours. It can't be too offensive and it is yours for non-commercial use. Other then that, go nuts!

Do you want a portrait of yourself standing on a volcano clenching your oiled muscles with your sword held high above your head? Of course you do. Or maybe you just want a portrait of your dog. It's up to you. Use your imagination.

Most of the backgrounds in the game took less than 10 hours to make, so you can have an idea of what I'm capable of. I'm no Frank Frazetta, but I will work hard to make you happy and include you in every step of the process. 

Know that I won't be able to start work on your painting until the game is done, and I'll start with the first people to contribute this amount. Please be patient. 

This is your chance to get a one of a kind work of art while the artist is hungry and unknown!

Plus everything above.
